entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-30045 | .NET Remote code Execution Vulnerability #307
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-30046 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #308

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ObjectStackAllocation: Assert failure "Precode->GetType() == PRECODE_FIXUP" #102294
    9.0.0
  • System.Data.OleDb x64 support #102290
  • Runtime_86027 test fails in jitstress-random #102285
    9.0.0
  • jitstress-isas-x86 fails with Assertion failed 'IsBaselineSimdIsaSupportedDebugOnly()' #102284
    9.0.0
  • Investigate what would be required to move some SIMD functionality out of the JIT and into managed code #102275
    Future
  • JIT generates better code when expression is stored in variable #102273
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce new string NormalizationForm for NFKC_Casefold #102269
    Future
  • Optimize the layout of the Tensor types #102268
    9.0.0
  • Ensure argument validation is being done for the Tensor APIs #102267
    9.0.0
  • Audit the usage of `scoped` in the Tensor APIs #102266
    9.0.0
  • `dotnet.js` cache busting (fingerprinting), Symptom: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'out') #102272
  • Blazor Hybird Release Buid error-target andriod #102276
  • [API Proposal]: Creating new TypeName with given AssemblyNameInfo #102263
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Failed to compile WinRT project #102259
    9.0.0
  • dotnet-pgo is not found in NuGet feeds #102257
  • [API Proposal]: Add TryGetSuccesor() and TryGetPrecessor() for SortedSet. #102253
  • [System.Linq] Consider supporting `Enumerable.TryGetNonEnumeratedCount` in `Enumerable.Select(..., Func<T, int, TResult>)` and `Enumerable.Index` #102252
    Future
  • [browser][MT] Assertion interp.c:4259 #102251
    9.0.0
  • [iOS/HybridGlobalization] No space between time and AM/PM designator #102250
  • Intrinsify Encoding.UTF8.GetByteCount for constant UTF-16 input #102246
    Future
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator use of Assembly.LoadFile #102245
  • Do not trim private methods used by the designer #102244
  • ImmutableArray<T>.Builder.RemoveRange Not Robust #102243
    Future
  • NativeAOT legs timing out in CI #102239
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.AiaTests.DisableAiaOptionWorks #102236
  • Nullable decimal comparison bug in dotnet 8.0.5 (SDK 8.0.300) #102234
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.ChainWithEmptySubject #102233
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.CollectionTests.X509ChainElementCollection_IndexerVsEnumerator #102232

Closed

  • "Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces, Version=1.0.0.0" in tests on Debian #102213
  • NativeAOT + classlib + macOS host + linux-bionic-arm64 target: doesn't work out of the box / inscrutable errors #101727
  • ConcurrentQueue's TryDequeue is not thread-safe #102256
  • Suboptimal struct zeroing in case of gc pointers #83297
    9.0.0
  • Building runtime on Windows 11 ARM machine targetting x64 #101668
  • UInt64 to Double conversions are incorrect #43895
    9.0.0
  • Bizarre decimal-to-double behavior difference on same machine, same code #102149
    9.0.0
  • ICU causes crash on iOS 17.4 simulator #98941
    9.0.0
  • Backport of #95390 (SignedXml.CheckSignature failing for valid Enveloped signature) seems to have failed #101163
  • [API Proposal]: `OverloadResolutionPriorityAttribute` #102173
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Mark LoadFrom overload that always throws as obsolete #102292
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix ROR(x, 32) on arm64 #102291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete some dead code in IL scanner #102289
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure that we don't hit an assert if DOTNET_EnableSSE2=0 #102288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Treat a couple more switches as output for make-repro-path #102287
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • ILLink: Check for all expected warnings, then fail if any are unmatched #102286
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #102283
    area-System.Security
  • ILLink: Remove ScopeStack from MarkStep #102282
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Canonicalize entry BB early #102280
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use the static libc++ with libstdc++ ABI our docker images now provide #102279
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove IgnoreExitCode from lld version check #102278
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Delete __if_exists #102277
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update prerequisites to add azure.identity #102274
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add `SetEntryAssembly()` API to `System.Reflection` #102271
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Move ML code to its own repo #102270
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] mmap/lock free allocator optimizations #102265
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • [QUIC] Validate Close/Abort errorCode parameter #102264
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add support for Sve.Store() #102262
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • JIT: Add reasoning about loop trip counts and optimize counted loops into downwards counted loops #102261
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add pseudoinstructions to disassembler #102260
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix Windows Arm64 unwinding #102258
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Allow downloading WebAssembly resources without performing other WebAssembly runtime initalization #102254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix SortedSet.InternalIndexOf 102118 #102249
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Eliminate dead branches around typeof comparisons #102248
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transition to 1ES templates (Backport #99433) #102242
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use OverloadResolutionPriority in a few places #102240
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • Add System.Formats.Sse #102238
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • [NativeAOT] Do not emit safe point for TLS_GET_ADDR calls into native runtime. #102237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure Single DI Registration For IStartupValidator #102235
    area-Extensions-Options, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Arm64/Sve: Implement Math's DotProduct* APIs #102218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • JIT: Reorder stores to make them amenable to stp optimization #102133
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize memory allocations (#98702) #99542
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Remove `RequiresPreviewFeatures` attribute on `Lock`, add test using the `lock` keyword #102222
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Provide MSBuild properties to use the new libc++ configuration we plan on using in our builds #101773
    blocked, area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Find & replace MS specific __int8/16/32/64 with standard C++ types #102241
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [workloads] Bump downlevel runtime produced package versions in the workload manifest #101806
    area-Workloads
  • [cdac] Remove Try versions of ReadGlobal* on target #102230
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the register conflict of the `REG_GSCOOKIE_TMP` and the `FastTailCall target register`. #102192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix some issues around accessing invalid blocks for Number.BigInteger #102224
    area-System.Numerics
  • Use SIMD for block inits with GC fields #102132
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove reflection from FrameworkDescription #102164
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Propagate VNF_PtrToLoc(lcl, offset) as GT_LCL_ADDR node #102227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Refactor IV opts a bit #102228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] optimize condition on mono_log_debug #102184
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] make MarshalerType enum const #102219
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix ulong->double conversion on x64 (without avx512f) #102179
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify convertDoubleToUInt64 #102225
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add OverloadResolutionPriorityAttribute #102176
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add the autocreated .mono/ folder to .gitignore #102054
    area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • [RISC-V] Add quirks for riscv to R2RDump #101683
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Create new X509CertificateLoader #102167
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Add more complete linux build instructions #101631
    area-Infrastructure
  • ILLink: Add EdgeVisitor and ITracingNode to enable logging dependency graph edges to illink dependency loggers #101949
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • add support for Impersonation and Delegation to HttpWebRequest #102038
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • make SocketAddress useable after receive timeout #102142
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • TypeDescriptor-related trimming supportType descriptor #102094
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move unicodedata to minipal #102139
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add some basic guidelines around using C++ standard headers now that our build allows us to #101088
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [release/6.0-staging] Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #102096
    area-System.IO.Compression, 6.0.x
  • Add InheritServiceKeyAttribute to enable resolving the dependencies with the same key #102160
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Fixed the discrepancy between applicationName between normal app launch and HostFactoryResolver launch #102152
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Fixed creating generic type with abstract type when it is has a default constractor constrant #101963
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift frozen struct lowering in mini-JIT/AOT/interpreter #102143
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Tensor wave 1 API's. #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Added cases to reuse the set if comparer matches #102182
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Rework ProbabilisticMap character checks in SearchValues #101001
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] `clang -fuse-ld=lld` output is low priority #102000
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Backport #92375 #102172
    area-Infrastructure
  • Expose the FusedMultiplyAdd and MultiplyAddEstimate APIs on relevant vector and scalar types #102181
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Mono] added simple reverse pinvoke support to interpreter #102185
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Interpret static constructors without a runtime invoke wrapper #101324
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add three-stage enqueuer/dispatcher scheme to SocketAsyncEngine, ThreadPoolWorkQueue and ThreadPoolTypedWorkItemQueue #100506
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Handle missing HTTP3 error cases #101923
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move CORINFO_HELP_BULK_WRITEBARRIER to a pre-Lower phase #102209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Separate hybrid globalization JS code to es6 module #101543
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64 when file offset is >4GB #102053
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Reapply keyword `params` #101499
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Removed unused sessions from SSL_CTX internal cache #102095
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • [browser][MT] enable jiterp #101252
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] tests #102212
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Fix debugger support in WasmAppBuilder #100675
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm] Suppress export name minification #102155
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [wasm][workloads] Check downlevel runtime versions #102190
    arch-wasm, area-Workloads, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix NegotiateStream connections between Linux clients and Windows servers #102216
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Update llvm-libunwind to v18 #102231
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ilasm support for methods with multiple documents #102199
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adjust repro file message for merged test #102141
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Add ProbeLoongArch64Quirks() for R2RDump tool. #102146
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • SVE: Added `LoadVectorx2`, `LoadVectorx3`, `LoadVectorx4` APIs #102180
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Discussion] Generate C# bindings for Foundation framework #2584
  • [Discussion] Generate C# bindings for CryptoKit framework #2583

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add basic support projecting frozen structs #2560

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `slnx` support in the `dotnet` CLI #40913
    9.0.1xx
  • dotnet watch fails with MSB3021 (locked file) when project references custom source generator #40911
  • Baseline package validator should allow breaking changes in major versions #40907
  • Trivy scanning of dotnet-sdk 8.0 #40894
  • Conversion error (CS0029) during compilation in .NET SDK 8.0.300 #40893
  • StackOverflowException after upgrading from .Net 6 to .Net 8 #40891

PullRequests

Created

  • Draft of a workload diagnostic document #40912
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #40910
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #40909
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #40908
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add warning for PreferNativeArm64 #40895
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #40890
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Bug dotnet/sdk-container-builds#559: PublishContainer Appends "dotnet <Target>.dll" to ENTRYPOINT for Self Contained Builds #40792
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [VMR] Publish scenario test results only when available #40903
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Add `http` prefix when docker config detect a insecure registry #40905
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `http` prefix when docker config detect a insecure registry #39840
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [VMR] Turn off SBOM generation for logs/patches #40892
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #40889
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add back missing PGO properties after installer->sdk repo consolidation #40886
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #40875
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Exception --> logged error in ResolvePackageAssets #40851
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • simplify GetOSVersion #40842
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Do not go beyond the root when searching for a previously installed tool Fixes #40655 #40800
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Fix Alpine Target RID #40843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #40881
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #40884
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Open questions for `field` and `value` as contextual keywords #8130

PullRequests

Created

  • Spec partial properties behavior with doc comments #8131

Merged

  • Add the speclet disclaimer to the merged C# 13 features #8129
  • Clarify caller-info behavior in partial properties/indexers #8127

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implicit conversion method prioritized over type declaration when using "Go to definition" on invalid constructor #73498
    Backlog
  • Colorization flickers when scrolling through a file #73496
  • Nullable attributes don't modify indexer parameter initial nullable state #73484
    Backlog
  • CallerArgumentExpression attributes on partial method parameters look at the implemention rather than definition parameter names #73483
  • CallerInfo attributes are emitted to metadata even when they are ignored in source #73482

Closed

  • Roslyn needs to move to System.Text.Json for LSP messages. #72867
  • Async iterators permit yield return inside of lock blocks #72443
    17.11
  • Test plan for "ref and unsafe in iterators and async" feature #72662
    .NET 9
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34914.66 #73480

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove dependency on all Roslyn assemblies from build host #73497
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make getting a SourceText from an IDE parsed tree not hit the LOH. #73494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cache values in dependent project finder #73493
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix assert in ref safety analysis around BoundConditionalReceiver node. #73491
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Verify that ref-in-async errors are not downgraded to warnings in unsafe context #73490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Update "ref in async" feature status #73489
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move AsyncBatchingWorkQueue usage in telemetry to TelemetryLogging level #73485
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Update attributes for STJ #73495
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge latest bits from 'main' branch into extensions branch #73486
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Rename public API based on API review decision #73476
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge 'main' into RefStructInterfaces #73492
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Report external build errors using the platform's diagnostic brokered #73477
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch Roslyn protocol types to System.Text.Json serialization #73207
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge "ref in async" feature into main #73488
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async, Next
  • Cache internal objects used by the formatting engine. #73487
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add more "ref in async" tests #73444
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Avoid enumeration allocations in formatting #73475
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Emit and roundtrip underlying instance field #73407
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Update bug-report.md #73481
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Use TextDocumentChangeRegistrationOptions for didChange registration #73462
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge 'main' into RefStructInterfaces #73478
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Avoid unnecessary full tree walks in the simplifier system #73473
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Partial properties: attributes #73437
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2452214 #73415
    auto-merge
  • Add runtime references to the devkit component output directory #73461
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consuming a RCL with static web assets containing certain characters in the filenames leads to "invalid static method syntax" #55745
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #55742
  • Perf improvement: mvc #55741
  • Difference between swaggers (Controllers vs Minimal API) #55737
    Discussions
  • Facing an issue with a newly created ASP.NET Core MVC project. #55736
  • Stop injecting "_framework/aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js" into the body of every generated web page of an asp.net core app. #55734
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Grpc.Swagger doesn't respect WriteEnumsAsIntegers for request contracts #55733
  • Blazor-Hybrid with grpc Hot-Reload error. #55730
  • Blazor server tries to execute JS that is not available in the browser yet. #55729
  • Cannot supply a component of type 'Components.BookComponent' because the current platform does not support the render mode 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.InteractiveServerRenderMode' #55728

Closed

  • Flaky test: LocationChangingHandlers_CannotCancelTheNavigationAsynchronously_UntilReturning #52407
    9.0-preview5
  • close connection after HEAD handler executed #55598
  • SignalR: Missing Accept-Header #47398
    9.0-preview5
  • -pt build images are deprecated #55466
    Infrastructure
  • Add pipeline that tests the latest IdentityModel nightlies #54180
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #55726
  • Buffering issues when returning an SSE response #55654
  • Outdated official docker images for ASP.NET Core runtime #55727
  • Error with Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation in PublishSingleFile publishing mode #54315
  • Perf regression: fortunes, plaintext_spring #55704
  • Perf improvement: json #55717
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #55718
  • EditForm requires either a Model parameter, or an EditContext parameter, please provide one of these. #55701

PullRequests

Created

  • Use new PipeWriter Json overloads #55740
    area-mvc
  • Fixup `HybridCache` public API #55732
    feature-caching, area-networking

Merged

  • Unquarantine `LocationChangingHandlers_CannotCancelTheNavigationAsynchronously_UntilReturning` #55744
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 9.0-preview5
  • Adding accept header to callsites within SignalR #55271
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #55743
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.1] Stop using -pt images #55463
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 2.1.x
  • Undo RemoveSharedFrameworkDependencies workaround #55739
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview5
  • Fix Abort Lock #55738
    area-networking, 9.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d83fee1` to `fa6de7f` #55655
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview5
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #55715
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.31
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #55713
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.6

Updated

  • Delete flaky test MultipleThreadsForceRefresh #55290
    area-dataprotection
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Use span.Equals instead of string.Compare in JumpTables #55724
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking
  • Temporarily skip Template.MVC tests on Helix #55696
    area-mvc
  • Add logging to MVC tests #55592
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • Fix for issue #54500: Middleware keyed dependency injection #55722
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Use JSON source generator in WebApplicationFactory #55595
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Improve performance of UriHelper.GetDisplayUrl #55611
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fixed LDAP nested group claims #55707
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Quarantine Locking_ExecuteAllRequestsWhenDisabled #55653
    area-middleware
  • [Blazor] Updated Blazor Server reconnect UI #55723
    area-blazor
  • Enable input number component to support type='range' attribute #55583
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Make DefaultProblemDetailsFactory public #55666
    area-mvc, community-contribution

  • Image caching #22418
  • [MAUI] The list does not show newly added recipes #22417

  • Missing NavigationBar and other elements while opening the app from sticky foreground service. #22416

Closed

Updated

  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leaks in `*Cell` #22067

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Post Process / Translate SelectExpression's lack of table #33730
  • use DefaultBoolean, DefaultInt and similar for distinguishing between nullable primitive type and non-nullable with default DB constraint #33729
  • Data denormalization in Ef Core and Azure Cosmos Db #33727
  • TransactionScope.Dispose causes a `A root ambient transaction was completed before the nested transaction. The nested transactions should be completed first` error #33726
  • Sql Bulk Operation as Part of a Migration #33724

Closed

  • SqlExpression for function with atypical format #33697
  • Discussion for Entity Framework weekly status updates #15404
    Discussions
  • .NET Data Biweekly Updates (2022) #27185
    Discussions
  • Plan for Entity Framework Core 7.0 #26994
    Discussions
  • Get PrimaryKey value in SavingChangesAsync interceptor #33686
  • Syntactic element ` is not correct #33619
  • Entity cannot be tracked because another instance with the same key value is already being tracked for optional relationships are not automatically deleted #33610
  • a bug in UseInMemoryDatabase #33593
  • Can't update row when UseHistoryTable is enabled. #33397
  • dont' even use include method when model is in self-references relationship #33725
  • Asserting 0 to Id column results in "Cannot insert the value NULL into column 'Id'" #33723
  • Use Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore & Oracle.EntityFrameworkCore get a ORA-00904: "FALSE": invalid identifier #33712
  • Publishing with Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UI and Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer 8.0.2+ adds webview2Loader.dll and msalruntime.dll resulting in app not starting #33685

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement sum and average aggregation for `decimal` in SQLite #33721

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #33728
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #33694
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Correctly initialize design-time relational model for externally built models #33719
  • Fixes #33635 - Translate ToString on enums with number store types as a CASE/WHEN expression #33706
